scripts.build: echo --Build server with esbuild-- && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --legal-comments=none --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js && cp -Rvf src/migrations dist/
scripts.dev-migrate: echo --Run tsx dev server-- && tsx src/index.js --migrate
scripts.dev: echo --Run tsx dev server-- && nodemon --watch src/**/*.ts --exec tsx src/index.ts
